name: VAL 31

basics.construction: FG w/poly foam, carbon and kev.

notes:
Prototype is 'Third Turtle, 2nd in the 1976 OSTAR. 
A popular and successful shorthanded racer of this time that had proven seaworthiness and could be built at a relatively low cost. Built by the designer and from plans by many others. It is said that 30 boats have been built to this design.
